Perfect! I found it - thank you for your patience. "Request Moderator Assistance" is actually the Escalate Topic feature in Khoros Classic.

According to the documentation, here's how to enable this for your 'Workday' role:

Step 1: Enable Manual Escalations
- Go to Community Admin > Mod Tools > Escalations
- Turn on manual thread-level escalations (this enables the option in the Topic Options menu)

Step 2: Grant the Permission
Users need one of these permissions to see "Escalate Topic" (which may appear as "Request Moderator Assistance") in the Options menu:
- "Escalate a topic or tweet to a CRM system" - allows escalating any topic
- "Escalate own topic to a CRM system" - allows escalating only their own topics

To grant this permission to the 'Workday' role:
1. Go to Community Admin > Users > Permissions > Roles
2. Find and edit the 'Workday' role
3. Look for the escalation permissions and grant the appropriate one
4. Click Save

Once you've enabled manual escalations and granted the permission to the 'Workday' role, users with that role should see the escalation option in the Topic Options menu.
